title: (((RITO READ)))-On/Off for free champs-(((GIFT LINK FOR MY VIEWERS)))

embed.description: FULL JAPAN EPISODE: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3aE2TYFU6WM&t=24s Next Episode of SONG VOYAGE - Wednesday, February 8th! Come back to see us bumble around AUSTRALIA! // Takeo Ischi, the greatest Chicken Yodeler the world has ever seen, returns to the Internet with a new addition to the oeuvre of Chicken Yodeling. Best deal on the Internet?

body:
DISCLAIMER -LINK IS A GIFT FROM ME NOT TO DO WITH ORIGINAL MEANING OF THIS DISCUSSION, THE LINK WAS OPTIONAL-
Okay, but really I was wondering if you guys ever thought about having an on / off switch for the free champ rotation, i like it alot just when i aram and do really good im denied keys/chests/ect. Also, when someone is frced to play a champ theyve NEVER even played or tried to play or know nothing about they do (((sometimes id say 60% really bad))) really bad, I was wondering if it'd be very difficult to maybe add that function in, either way ill still continue to play m8. 
thank.
